hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select a.cust_customer_code as external_Customer_Code, a.cust_customer_name as external_Customer_Name, a.ann_customer_code as customer_Code, a.ann_customer_name as customer_Name, a.plant_id as platform from mid_customer_control a where status = '0' <<and a.cust_customer_code = :externalCustomerCode>> <<and a.cust_customer_name = :externalCustomerName>> <<and a.ann_customer_code = :customerCode>> <<and a.ann_customer_name = :customerName>> <<and a.plant_id = :platform>>
